unit.name: Chaos Warhound
unit.notes: May step over units and pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees and less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit takes a point of damage.

unit.name: Plaguehound
unit.notes: May step over units and pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees and less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit takes a point of damage.

unit.name: Bloodhound
specialRules: Must be armed with either Death Storm or Plasma Furnace
unit.notes: May step over units and pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees and less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit takes a point of damage.

unit.name: Warphound
unit.notes: May step over units and pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees and less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit takes a point of damage.

unit.name: Chaos Warbringer
unit.notes: May step over units and pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees and less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit’s plasma reactor has been breached. Roll a D6 for each breach on the unit in the End Phase of each turn. On a roll of 1 the unit is destroyed and all units within 5cm suffer a hit on a roll of 5+, and on a roll of 4–6 the breach has been repaired. Any breach not repaired causes one point of damage.

unit.name: Chaos Reaver
unit.notes: May step over units and pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees and less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit’s plasma reactor has been breached. Roll a D6 for each breach on the unit in the End Phase of each turn. On a roll of 1 the unit is destroyed and all units within 5cm suffer a hit on a roll of 5+, and on a roll of 4–6 the breach has been repaired. Any breach not repaired causes one point of damage.

unit.name: Reviler Titan
specialRules: Must be armed with either Hex Geschütz, Turbo Blaster or Plasma Cremator
unit.notes: May step over units and pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees and less than 2cm wide. Critical Hit Effect: The unit’s plasma reactor has been breached. Roll a D6 for each breach on the unit in the End Phase of each turn. On a roll of 1 the unit is destroyed and all units within 5cm suffer a hit on a roll of 5+, and on a roll of 4–6 the breach has been repaired. Any breach not repaired causes one point of damage.

unit.name: Vicebringer Titan
unit.notes: May transport 4 infantry units without Beritten or Jump Packs. May step over units and pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees and less than 2cm wide.
